Morning Bid: Stocks eye best weekly run since JuneA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:50:38 GMT DASGK27WENNTTJ3YFKAH3VCNAY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-2024-02-08/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
French authorities searched Huawei offices over financial wrongdoings - reportsChinese tech giant Huawei said on Thursday a search took place at its French office two days ago, confirming earlier reports from local media about a raid by France's PNF prosecution office linked to potential embezzlement charges. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 19:32:43 GMT 3RD4GVU7SRNQTITGQU5KW6FMMU https://www.reuters.com/technology/french-authorities-searched-huawei-offices-over-financial-wrongdoings-reports-2024-02-08/Reuters技术
US lawmakers accuse VC firms of funding Chinese military-linked firmsSequoia Capital China, Qualcomm Ventures and three other U.S. venture capital firms plowed at least $3 billion into Chinese tech companies that support Beijing's military and its repression of minorities in Xinjiang, a U.S. congressional report alleged on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 18:33:24 GMT JGX5DDUZARNEXNOQC64BE2MV4E https://www.reuters.com/business/us-lawmakers-accuse-vc-firms-funding-chinese-military-linked-firms-2024-02-08/Reuters商业
US lawmakers urge Commerce to put TikTok-parent ByteDance on export control listA group of 15 U.S. lawmakers on Thursday urged the Commerce Department to add TikTok's China-based parent company ByteDance to a government export control list to restrict its access to American software. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 18:07:19 GMT Z4SM2EGLXFOH5A6GWJ5SKB22XI https://www.reuters.com/technology/lawmakers-urge-commerce-put-tiktok-parent-bytedance-export-control-list-2024-02-08/David Shepardson可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
TikTok challenges EU supervisory fee, following Meta’s footstepsChinese online social media platform TikTok has challenged a supervisory fee amounting to 0.05% of its annual worldwide net income to cover EU regulators' costs of monitoring compliance with new EU rules, the second company to do so after Meta Platforms . Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:38:28 GMT C7ZAZBWGAFKO5IPZLFYCK4TDW4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-challenges-eu-supervisory-fee-following-metas-footsteps-2024-02-08/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Wu and Lombard share lead after first round in QatarChina's Ashun Wu and South African Zander Lombard carded five-under-par 67s to share the one-shot lead after the first round of the Qatar Masters on Thursday at the Doha Golf Club. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:33:24 GMT T5W2A62QCRJZPOPMCKECQXBLG4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/wu-lombard-share-lead-after-first-round-qatar-2024-02-08/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
